 2007-16092007-10-25,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  TC
PrecisAuthority to the Minister of Transport, Infrastructure and Communities, to transfer to PMG TECHNOLOGIES INC. for the use of certain moveable properties under the contract with PMG, in accordance with the attached Order in Council. These consist of laboratory instruments, test equipment and various machinery representing a pruchase value in the order of $14,500,000.
